itemDescription: Irish-born admiral, founding-father of Ecuadorian Navy

wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Charles Wright (1799–1868) was an Irish-born naval admiral that was a founding-father of the Ecuadorian Navy, and a general in Simón Bolívar's army. He is noted as a leading militarist in the struggle for the independence of Ecuador and other South American countries.

response: * Thomas Charles Wright Admiral and Genera A founder of the Ecuadorian Navy/
* Thomas Charles Wright (1799–?), Irish-born admiral, founding-father of Ecuadorian Navy
* 1817 - Daniel Florence O'Leary, James Rooke, Thomas Charles Wright & Juan Illingworth Hunt enlist under Bolivar
